label.en: FP - Floor mode with minimum power limitation
label.nl: FP - Floor mode with minimum power limitation

hint.en: Sensor type selection. Selects the type of floor/external sensor. (default: 10k ntc)
hint.nl: Sensor type selection. Selects the type of  oor/external sensor. (#1, standaard: 10k ntc)

hint.en:
Limits the lowest allowed floor temperature to this value. Operational in modes AF/F/FP. In F or FP mode, setpoint is also limited. 
Range: 50 - 400 (5.0C - 40.0C) 
Default: 50
hint.nl:
Limits the lowest allowed floor temperature to this value. Operational in modes AF/F/FP. In F or FP mode, setpoint is also limited. 
Bereik: 50 - 400 (5.0C - 40.0C)
Standaard: 5

hint.en:
Limits the highest allowed floor temperature to this value. Operational in modes AF/F/FP. In F or FP mode, setpoint is also limited. 
Range: 50 - 400 (5.0C - 40.0C) 
Default: 50
hint.nl:
Limits the highest allowed floor temperature to this value. Operational in modes AF/F/FP. In F or FP mode, setpoint is also limited. 
Bereik: 50 - 400 (5.0C - 40.0C)
Standaard: 400

hint.en:
Limits the setpoint (CO/ECO) min. setting when in Room regulating mode (A/AF/A2). 
Range: 50 - 400 (5.0C - 40.0C) 
Default: 50
hint.nl:
Limits the setpoint (CO/ECO) min. setting when in Room regulating mode (A/AF/A2). 
Bereik: 50 - 400 (5.0C - 40.0C)
Standaard: 50

hint.en:
Limits the setpoint (CO/ECO) max. setting when in Room regulating mode (A/AF/A2). 
Range: 50 - 400 (5.0C - 40.0C) 
Default: 50
hint.nl:
Limits the setpoint (CO/ECO) max. setting when in Room regulating mode (A/AF/A2). 
Bereik: 50 - 400 (5.0C - 40.0C)
Standaard: 400

label.en: PLo: Minimum power level for Power Reg mode
label.nl: PLo: Minimum power level for Power Reg mode

hint.en:
Min power level in Power Regulator Mode (setting 2. Temperature sensor - P). 
Range: 0 - 9 (0% - 90%)
Default: 0
hint.nl:
Min power level in Power Regulator Mode (setting 2. Temperature sensor - P). 
Bereik: 0 - 9 (0% - 90%)
Standaard: 0

label.en: Power level in Power regulator mode
label.nl: Power level in Power regulator mode

hint.en:
Power level in Power regulator mode. 
Range: 0 - 10 (0% - 100%) 
Default: 2
hint.nl:
Power level in Power regulator mode. 
Bereik: 0 - 10 (0% - 100%)
Standaard: 2
